query: UPDATE companies SET partnerCode = CONCAT('BRK', UPPER(SUBSTRING(MD5(RAND()), 1, 6))) WHERE partnerCode IS NULL;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Fmyq5DhyXRREKB.root --database 2BVimoerGJ5AEbhy4VpTbU --execute UPDATE companies SET partnerCode = CONCAT('BRK', UPPER(SUBSTRING(MD5(RAND()), 1, 6))) WHERE partnerCode IS NULL;
